definitions.definition: The plant , a vine of genus Vitis , on which grapes grow.
examples: Although many grapevines have geographical names, these rarely reflect their real origin, if known at all.

definitions.definition: An informal person-to-person means of circulating information or gossip .
examples: I heard through the grapevine that Jim will be leaving soon.

definitions.definition: A move in which the feet are alternately placed in front of each other, while both remaining on the ice or ground, incorporating half-turns.
A dance figure in partner dancing that includes sidesteps and steps across the support foot. See Grapevine (dance move) .

main_definition: The plant , a vine of genus Vitis , on which grapes grow.
secondary_definitions: An informal person-to-person means of circulating information or gossip .
( rare , apparently primarily Indian English ) A rumor .
( skating ) A move in which the feet are alternately placed in front of each other, while both remaining on the ice or ground, incorporating half-turns.
A dance figure in partner dancing that includes sidesteps and steps across the support foot. See Grapevine (dance move) .
